block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 2 / LED 0.5 / 5 most convenient method to check for connection is to click on this block this is actually digital output using pin 2 to turn ON/OFF the built-in LED it will blink for 5s at ON/OFF interval of 0.5s
0 1 Digital Output can be set using this block 0 : output set to LOW 1 : output set to HIGH
2 - This is the digital output block there is 2 drop down list for user to select from 1st is the pin - all the pin numbers is available here 2nd is the output set value
LED LED A blink LED block to blink built-in LED
Snap Can right click on this block and select edit to see the actual Snap! blocks inside
/ Can right click again on the portion we want and select duplicate to make a copy of the block to paste outside for editing/testing
